title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 6403.3 - Quorums and voting
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 6403.3 - Quorums and voting

State Regulations
(a) The council and council committees shall convene, conduct business, vote and
act in accordance with the quorum and voting provisions of section
41
of
the General Construction Law. (1)

The
council. (i) Quorums and voting. The council
shall convene and conduct business and vote on council matters only in the
presence of a quorum consisting of an absolute majority of the total authorized
membership of the council. The council shall act only upon the vote of an
absolute majority of the total authorized membership of the council. (b) Council committees. (1)

Quorums and voting. Each council
committee shall convene and conduct business and vote on council matters only
in the presence of a quorum consisting of an absolute majority of the total
authorized membership of the council committee. Each council committee shall
act only upon the vote of an absolute majority of the total authorized
membership of the council committee. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes
R. & Regs. Tit. 9
ยง
6403.3

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
